medical_history.chief_complaint: 3 days of abdominal pain radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was in his usual state of health until ___ when he developed right sided abdominal pain radiating to the back. Abdominal pain persisted over the weekend with spikes in fevers to 103, associated chills, and nausea. Reports an episode of emesis.
medical_history.family_history: Father: coronary artery disease; Mother: osteoporosis.
